mapper.insert: insert into product_table(productName, productPrice, productQu, productContents, fileAttached) values (#{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productQu}, #{productContents},#{fileAttached})
insert into product_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, productId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{productId})
mapper.update: update product_table set productName = #{productName},productPrice = #{productPrice},productQu = #{productQu}, productContents = #{productContents} where id=#{id}
